Package stores

Class BranchStorage

Object
BranchStorage
public class BranchStorage extends Object
The BranchStorage class is responsible for storing and managing Branch objects. It implements the Storage interface. All methods and fields are static.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final String
    branchDataPath
    The path to the serialized data file for storing branch information.
    private static HashMap<Integer,Branch>
    branches
    A map that stores branches with their corresponding IDs.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static void add(Branch branch)
      Adds a Branch object to the storage.
      Parameters:
      branch - The Branch object to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the branch is null or if a branch with the same ID already exists.

    • remove

      public static void remove(Branch branch)
      Removes a Branch object from the storage.
      Parameters:
      branch - The Branch object to be removed.

    • update

      public static void update(Branch branch)
      Updates a Branch object in the storage.
      Parameters:
      branch - The Branch object to be updated.

    • get

      public static Branch get(int branchID)
      Retrieves a Branch object from the storage based on the branch ID.
      Parameters:
      branchID - The ID of the branch to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Branch object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • get

      public static Branch get(String branchName)
      Retrieves a Branch object from the storage based on the branch name.
      Parameters:
      branchName - The name of the branch to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Branch object with the specified name, or null if not found.

    • getAll

      public static Branch[] getAll()
      Retrieves all Branch objects from the storage.
      Returns:
      An array of all Branch objects in the storage.

    • save

      public static void save()
      Saves the current state of the storage to a file.

    • load

      public static void load()
      Loads the stored data from a file, or initializes a new storage if the file does not exist.

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clears all Branch objects from the storage.
